quiz.question: Which leader is most associated with non-violent independence struggle?
Which leader signed the Indo-Soviet Treaty of Peace and Friendship in 1971?
Which Indian leader negotiated and oversaw accession of Hyderabad state in 1948?
Who delivered India’s 'Tryst with Destiny' speech on independence night?
Which political event triggered the Emergency declaration in India in 1975?
options: Political instability and a court judgment against the Prime Minister
quiz.answer: Political instability and a court judgment against the Prime Minister

quiz.question: Who was the first Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh after its 1956 reorganization?
Which party led India through most of the early decades after independence?
Who became India’s first Dalit President in 1997?
Which Indian leader played a central role in integrating princely states alongside V. P. Menon?
Who served as Prime Minister during the 1991 economic reforms?
Who served as President of India from 2007 to 2012?
Which Indian leader created the office of the National Human Rights Commission in 1993?
Which body conducts national elections in India?
Who became the first Chief Minister of Delhi after the 1951 elections?
Which President returned a bill for reconsideration to Parliament in the 1980s?
options: President Neelam Sanjiva Reddy returned the bill
President Zail Singh returned the Assam Accord related bill
President R. Venkataraman returned the bill
quiz.answer: President Zail Singh returned the Assam Accord related bill
